items.html: HMP worksheets will effectively support today’s team-based care environments by offering configurable, role-based, workflow-driven views that provide the tools and clinical resources users need to streamline patient care while improving care quality. The application’s modular architecture is capable of delivering a virtually limitless number of single-patient, role-based, and condition-driven worksheets, enabling each site to determine the combinations of data views, actions, and clinical-decision resources that best support the way its clinical staff delivers care.

Eventually, HMP’s workflow-driven views will offer all of the information and services healthcare professionals need to efficiently perform associated tasks—such as stepping them through information-gathering processes and procedures that correspond to best-practices treatment guidelines. And, depending upon the nature of the specific workflow, HMP will allow users to arrange their worksheets to optimize the way they personally deliver care.
